Description: Jamjoom Pharma is pharmaceutical company
Full Description: Jamjoom Pharma is pharmaceutical company.  Jamjoom Pharma has  emerged, as one of the leading pharmaceutical companies in the region. The geographical focus of the company is on countries in the Middle East, Africa and CIS regions. Strategic focus on selected therapeutic categories has contributed to the rapid growth, market acceptance and overall success of the company. Jamjoom Pharma has state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities which encapsulates the latest in manufacturing technology, systems and processes. The facility has aroused the attention and admiration of the professionals from international pharmaceutical industry. The company continuously keeps abreast of the latest developments in Pharma manufacturing technology and practices, and readily adopts and integrates these into the existing manufacturing systems to upgrade the capabilities investment in new manufacturing units are under process in Egypt and in Algeria. Egypt is 100% Jamjoom owned and in Algeria a joint venture unit in heavy setup.

Description: Advanta Seeds specializes in the development of farming solutions and technology in plant breeding.
Full Description: Advanta Seeds is focused on sustainable agriculture and providing farmers with quality seeds. Access to high-quality seeds, especially to smallholder farmers, is an essential part of the solution to global food security. Our proprietary technologies develop better quality hybrids and increase crop yield resulting in market leadership across various products in different regions. Advanta Seeds was established in 2013 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

Description: We have developed a bioreactor technology that harnesses CO2 during operation and produces Wolffia, a high-quality, plant-based protein.

We have developed a fully automated sustainable bioreactor technology that produces high-quality plant-based protein from Wolffia and harnesses CO2 during operation. The advantages of our bioreactor solution are: •  Operates 24/7; 365 days a year; •  Suitable for any climate, provides a weekly harvest;  •  Requiring only water and electricity to run. Biovolf’s technology is aimed at the 4 UN’s SDG Agenda Goals.  Already raised $1,1M. HQ – Singapore; 2 branches in the UAE. Next round offer - $5M for 15% equity. Intravides is a biomedical startup.
Full Description: Intravides is a team of research scientists and engineers who are passionate about Neuroscience, biology and informatics. They join forces to come up with solutions to conquer the medical world where their target audience would be medical practitioners of all ages and specialties, spanning from medical students of all levels to professional doctors and surgeons. They are experts in Imaging, data visualization and image processing as well as mixing research with state of the art augmented/virtual reality (AR/VR) hardware and software. Their current solution involves developing an AR system that enables neurosurgeons to practice surgery of tumor extraction with higher accuracy, less invasion as well as less post-surgery complications. They exploit the advancement in digital medical imaging techniques in building their AR based visual system from the ground up by using it as their main source of data and the backbone of their system.

Industries: Advanced Materials, Biotechnology, Information Technology, Manufacturing
Description: Nanosferix develops ultra lightweight nano-fillers for use with advanced composites for lightweight yet strong materials.
Full Description: Nanosferix is a product of Innovative Industrial Materials Factory LLC – a spinoff company from the KAUST Catalysis Center, supported by the Innovation Fund and Technology Office at the King Abdullah University of Science and Technology (KAUST). They make hollow-silica fillers to allow ultralight engineering composite materials for high performance and advanced material applications. Nanosferix Hollow Silica is a unique and novel technology that works with commercial material systems to reduce the silica filler weight loading.

Description: Carbon CPU is a biotechnology startup specializing in turning food waste into fatty acids for use as livestock nutrients.
Full Description: Carbon-CPU utilizes next-generation biotechnology to transform food waste into useful fatty acids needed as livestock nutrients. Every year, more than 1 billion tons of food waste is generated globally. However, the high organic content in this food waste makes it a very valuable resource. Globally, the demand for fatty acids is far more than what has been supplied, over 500k tons of fatty acids are required for the animal feed industry while only 30k tons are produced. Carbon-CPU aims to fill this gap by producing high-value bioproducts at a much lower cost and environmental burden, compared to the traditional chemical synthesis.

Description: Newbridge Pharmaceuticals is a pharmaceutical and medical device company engaged in developing oncology and supportive care products.
Full Description: Newbridge Pharmaceuticals, a pharmaceutical, biologics, and medical device company, engages in the sale and marketing of healthcare products. It offers oncology and supportive care products, such as CLASTEON, a bisphosphonate, which treats problems associated with bone metastasis; SANCUSO, a granisetron transdermal system for the prevention of chemotherapy induced nausea and vomiting; and GLICONORM, a film-coated divisible tablet for the treatment of non-insulin dependent diabetes mellitus. The company provides therapeutic products for diseases, such as diabetes, obesity, oncology, and cardiovascular diseases, as well as for other metabolic disorders. It serves biotechnology and pharmaceutical companies in the Middle East, Africa, Turkey, and Caspian Regions. Newbridge Pharmaceuticals was founded in 2007 and is based in Dubai, the United Arab Emirates.
